title: Death of the Grand Hotel
description: If you like Murakami, Borges, Italo Calvino, Cortázar, Bolaño and similar writers then you will like my collection of short stories. It is a literary fiction about people, love, hate, fear, freedom, search of identity, magical realism and storytelling. An idiosyncratic man comes to Brussels looking for a replica of the happiest day in his life. A young American student is waiting in Frankfurt International Airport for her plane when a stranger asks her to pass a note to his lover. This easy favour turns into a little unforeseen adventure. A young man in Latvia questions his identity through the soviet times, collapse of the regime and the new world of capitalism. A husband investigates the mysterious disappearances of his wife in the famous Grand Hotel.
author: Barbara Sea
